name: Bjørn
description: Bjørn har en bachelorgrad fra NITH. Han har jobbet med .NET, Web og MS SQL server siden 2003. I 13 år har Bjørn jobbet som utvikler av programvare og integrasjoner innen bank og finans for SS&C Advent. De siste prosjektene har vært front-end utvikling i Angular.Bjørn bruker fritiden sammen med familie, samboer og to barn, og venner. Han er glad i kjøre på ski og i friluftsliv.
haiku:
Coded life unfolds
Ski tracks in the winter air
Freedom's snowy dance
summary_en:
Here is a short paragraph in English summarizing the description of Bjørn:

Bjørn holds a bachelor's degree from NITH and has been working with .NET, web, and MS SQL server since 2003. He has spent 13 years developing software and integrations within banking and finance for SS&C Advent, most recently focusing on front-end development in Angular. In his free time, Bjørn enjoys spending time with family, friends, and his two children, as well as engaging in outdoor activities like skiing.
